quiltlook.keys.title: QuiltLook
quiltlook.config.title: Configure QuiltLook
quiltlook.config.perspective.name: Perspective
quiltlook.config.perspective.desc: When set to anything other than "Keep", the perspective to use when active.
quiltlook.config.activation_mode.name: Activation Mode
quiltlook.config.activation_mode.desc: The mode of activation; "Hold" to hold the key, "Toggle" to press it to turn it on and of.
